version_description: We have made minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
We have added a brand new category, "Masters Collection", for our proficient users.
We have added a brand new category, "Masters Collection", for our proficient users.
You will now be able to add any word from other apps and websites to Atlas.

You will now be able to save words to your favorites with your own example.
Masters Collection category has become richer with new words added.
Now you can search for specific words in the favorites tab. You can also edit the definitions and sample sentences of the saved words.

We have improved the search functionality in the Favorites tab. When doing a search, you can use the word itself, one of its synonyms or a keyword that appears in the definition. You can see the Oxford translations of the words you add to your Favorites in more than 10 languages.

Keep improving your English with Atlas!
With this update, we have made the interface even better for the iPad.
We have also improved the search functionality in the Journal tab, making it possible to search for the words you saved in the lists.
As always, we have made some bug fixes and performance improvements.

Keep improving your English with Atlas!
With this update, we have renewed the Profile tab completely!
Now you can:
- customize your word reminder notifications,
- customize your Widget and its content,
- track your progress more efficiently,
- synchronize your progress on multiple devices,
- and customize the size of the Journal icons.
Besides all these, we have made some bug fixes and performance improvements as usual.

With this update, we have added 3 more levels to address our proficient users' needs and adapted our placement test to cover these levels.
We also added accent choice to our pronunciation feature.
Now you can:
- take our placement test that covers a bigger range of vocabulary at especially advanced levels.
- learn more words at advanced levels.
- choose American or British accent for the pronunciation feature.
Besides all these, we have made some bug fixes and performance improvements as usual.

We have completely redesigned the Vocabulary Journal tab for a better experience and introduced new exercise types.
Now you can:
- choose the type of exercise you want to do on your Vocabulary Journal,
- do spelling and synonym exercises with your words on your Vocabulary Journal,
- view practice results after each study session,
- practice your words with our new and smarter method based on your performance,
Besides all these, we have made some bug fixes and performance improvements as usual.
